tldr: Affected versions of this package may display unauthorized columns in the HTML builder, potentially allowing unauthorized users to view or interact with sensitive data that should be restricted.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `yajra/laravel-datatables-html` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor
